name: part_003
file: tmp_【#あくシオ3Dライブ】おうたのはっぴょうかい！【ホロライブ⧸湊あくあ・紫咲シオン】 [_xL58zG9k5k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Aqua and Shion talk about their songs and interact with the audience before their next performance.
Instrumental transition and stage setup for the next song.
Performance of the song 'Rettou Joutou' (Bring It On).

subtitles.original: アクア...紫色のパレット
subtitles.english: Aqua-Murasaki-iro Palette...

subtitles.original: いろいろ...ちょっと待って待って、私のオリ曲だよねそれ
subtitles.english: Whoa, wait, wait! That's my original song!

subtitles.original: アクアは紫色のパレット歌ってメイジ・オブ・バイオレットを...
subtitles.english: Aqua sings "Aqua-Murasaki-iro Palette" and "Mage of Violet"...

subtitles.original: そしたら「メイジ・オブ・アクアパレット」にならなきゃいけないと思うんだけど
subtitles.english: Then it'd have to be "Mage of Aqua Palette," wouldn't it?

subtitles.original: あれ？おかしいねこれ
subtitles.english: Huh? That's weird.

subtitles.original: おかしい！おかしいね
subtitles.english: It's weird! It's weird!

subtitles.original: ということでね、みんなどうだったかな？ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Anyway, how was it, everyone? Thank you!

subtitles.original: 笑ってる、「草」って言われてる！
subtitles.english: They're laughing! They're saying "lol"!

subtitles.original: アイドルに向かって「草」って！
subtitles.english: Saying "lol" to idols!

subtitles.original: そうだよ、今日は私たちアイドルだから！
subtitles.english: That's right! We're idols today!

subtitles.original: 私たち「あくシオちゃん」だからね！
subtitles.english: We're "Akushio-chan" after all!

subtitles.original: マジで意味わかんないけど、可愛いでしょう？
subtitles.english: I don't really get it, but we're cute, right?

subtitles.original: あくシオちゃん。今日のサムネ超気に入ってるんだからね
subtitles.english: We're Akushio-chan. I really like today's thumbnail!

subtitles.original: あくシオちゃんだよ！
subtitles.english: It's Akushio-chan!

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと待って...え、ちょっと、やだ！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait a minute... No!

subtitles.original: 媚び売らないで！
subtitles.english: Don't try so hard to be cute!

subtitles.original: 私のチャンネルの紫シオン！
subtitles.english: On my channel, Murasaki Shion...

subtitles.original: 媚び売らないで！
subtitles.english: Don't try so hard to be cute!

subtitles.original: 今日はね、最後にね、なんかすごい告知が...
subtitles.english: Today, at the very end, there's a big announcement...

subtitles.original: あるらしいので、楽しみにしといてくれると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: ...apparently, so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please do!

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと、もう次の曲、まだまだありますから！
subtitles.english: Well then, we still have more songs to go!

subtitles.original: まだまだありますから！
subtitles.english: Still more to come!

subtitles.original: こっからは二人ですかね？
subtitles.english: From here on, it's just the two of us?

subtitles.original: 歌お！
subtitles.english: Let's sing!

subtitles.original: そうだね、二人で歌おっか！
subtitles.english: Right, let's sing together!

subtitles.original: あくシオライブ、歌おっか！
subtitles.english: Since it's an Akushio live, let's sing!

subtitles.original: じゃあその前にちょっとお着替えを...
subtitles.english: But before that, we need to change clothes...

subtitles.original: あ、そうだそうだ！
subtitles.english: Oh, right, right!

subtitles.original: ちょっと見ないでよ！
subtitles.english: Don't look!

subtitles.original: 見ないでよ、変態まじで！
subtitles.english: Don't look, you perverts! Seriously!

subtitles.original: 見たいんでしょ、本当は！
subtitles.english: You want to see, don't you? Admit it.

subtitles.original: あ, シオンの方が壁側にいるから
subtitles.english: Oh, Shion is closer to the wall.

subtitles.original: しょうがないな
subtitles.english: Can't be helped then!

subtitles.original: バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 劣等上等
subtitles.english: Bring It On

subtitles.original: 劣等上等 BRING IT ON
subtitles.english: Bring It On, BRING IT ON

subtitles.original: 劣等上等 BRING IT ON
subtitles.english: Bring It On, BRING IT ON

subtitles.original: 野となれ山となれ　マシマシで
subtitles.english: Come what may, let's go all out

subtitles.original: 火に油注いで　そんじゃおさらば
subtitles.english: Fanning the flames, then it's goodbye

subtitles.original: コミュニケーション気取りで
subtitles.english: Pretending to communicate

subtitles.original: 酒場の見物ばかりじゃつまんねぇ
subtitles.english: Just watching from the bar is boring

subtitles.original: ほらもっと　間違って上等
subtitles.english: Come on, making more mistakes is fine

subtitles.original: 退屈に手をかけて
subtitles.english: Take hold of this boredom

subtitles.original: ママ、やっぱ私は
subtitles.english: Mom, after all, I...

subtitles.original: こんなところじゃ終われない
subtitles.english: ...can't end up in a place like this

subtitles.original: ぬるくて気が触れそう
subtitles.english: It's so lukewarm, I'm going crazy

subtitles.original: ごっこ遊びも芝居もさよなら
subtitles.english: Goodbye to playing house and acting

subtitles.original: ずっとこのままなんてさ
subtitles.english: Staying like this forever...

subtitles.original: いられないよ
subtitles.english: ...is impossible

subtitles.original: ダッダッダ　あたし大人になる
subtitles.english: Da-da-da, I'm becoming an adult

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも噛み分けて今
subtitles.english: Tasting the sour and the sweet now

subtitles.original: パッパッパ　変わる時代
subtitles.english: Pa-pa-pa, the changing era

subtitles.original: 悪いことばかりじゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: Isn't just about bad things, right?

subtitles.original: 過去も、罪も、罰も、すべて
subtitles.english: Past, sins, punishment—everything

subtitles.original: 素手で、愛で、生き抜いてやり返すわ
subtitles.english: I'll survive with bare hands and love, and pay it back

subtitles.original: Yeah、頂上、あたしたちは Now
subtitles.english: Yeah, at the top, we're here now

subtitles.original: 緑のアイツにボコボコ待ってんね
subtitles.english: Waiting to beat up that green guy

subtitles.original: さあ、合図になったらもらえる金貨
subtitles.english: Now, the gold coins you get when the signal sounds

subtitles.original: 赤ペン入れてりゃ　どこがダメなんですか
subtitles.english: What's wrong with marking it with a red pen?

subtitles.original: 世間様ちゃっちゃっちゃってコンプリートして
subtitles.english: Complacently completing society's expectations

subtitles.original: 冗談じゃん　落書き
subtitles.english: You're joking, it's just a scribble

subtitles.original: 中指立てたくなるような事ありすぎて
subtitles.english: So many things make me want to flip the bird

subtitles.original: 指が足りねぇから　ハンズアップ　ハンズアップ
subtitles.english: Not enough fingers, so hands up, hands up!

subtitles.original: もっとだろ？
subtitles.english: You want more?

subtitles.original: ママ、なんもいらない
subtitles.english: Mom, I don't need anything

subtitles.original: 欲しがります死ぬまでは
subtitles.english: I'll be greedy until I die

subtitles.original: 伸びた背丈　育った街に投げキッス
subtitles.english: Blowing a kiss to the city I grew up in

subtitles.original: 今は届かない　覚悟しとけよ
subtitles.english: It won't reach now, just you wait

subtitles.original: ダッダッダ　僕ら大人になる
subtitles.english: Da-da-da, we're becoming adults

subtitles.original: カウンター狙い　痛い日々も
subtitles.english: Aiming for a counter, even painful days

subtitles.original: タンタンと　かます刺激
subtitles.english: Tan-tan, dealing out stimulation

subtitles.original: 誰も読めない先の展開　それ以上
subtitles.english: A future development no one can read, and more

subtitles.original: 過去も、嘘も、罰も、すべて
subtitles.english: Past, lies, punishment—everything

subtitles.original: 生きて、生き抜いて、覆すわよ
subtitles.english: Living, surviving, I'll overturn it all

subtitles.original: たったくだらない
subtitles.english: Just something so trivial

subtitles.original: 言葉だけが譲れない
subtitles.english: But those words are the only thing I won't give up on

subtitles.original: わかるか？　あたしの美学
subtitles.english: Do you get it? My aesthetic

subtitles.original: この馬鹿正直な
subtitles.english: This stupidly honest...

subtitles.original: 拳一つが
subtitles.english: ...single fist...

subtitles.original: 切り札
subtitles.english: ...is my trump card

subtitles.original: ガンガン踊れよ
subtitles.english: Dance vigorously

subtitles.original: いちぬけた
subtitles.english: I'm the first to leave

subtitles.original: サラバ！
subtitles.english: Farewell!
